cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.27, Omega_b=0.045, h=0.67, A_s=2e-09, n_s=
    0.96, transfer_function=tf, mu_0=0.1, sigma_0=0.2)
sigma8 = ccl.sigma8(cosmo)
cosmo_s8 = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.27, Omega_b=0.045, h=0.67, sigma8=sigma8,
    n_s=0.96, transfer_function=tf, mu_0=0.1, sigma_0=0.2)
assert np.allclose(ccl.sigma8(cosmo), ccl.sigma8(cosmo_s8))
if tf != 'boltzmann_isitgr':
    a = 0.8
    gfac = (ccl.growth_factor(cosmo, a) / ccl.growth_factor(cosmo_s8, a)) ** 2
    pk_rat = ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmo, 0.0001, a
        ) / ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmo_s8, 0.0001, a)
    assert np.allclose(pk_rat, gfac)
pytest.mark.parametrize('tf', ['boltzmann_class', 'boltzmann_camb',
    'boltzmann_isitgr'])
